title: McCall’s Sewing Patterns - Sewdirect
text: McCall's Interpreting trends as swiftly as they appear on the high street, McCall’s are popular for their fashion forward styles. And beginner sewing patterns don’t need to be boring! Learn to sew gorgeous clothes that are perfect for the modern maker with easy to follow instructions and helpful sewing tips. The McCall’s vintage pattern collection features designs from the 1940s through to the 1990s. Our Laura Ashley sewing pattern collection has been a smash hit since their re-release. Check out our range of McCall’s Indie Sewing Pattern collaborations for you to try with designs from Brandi Joan and Melissa Watson! Great, we've found 1136 matching products.
